name: Dinner Tonight: Leek and Cheese Pie
description: I think I set myself up for a failure. What came out of the oven was so at odds with what I imagined it should be that I couldn't help be be disappointed. It was too rich and homogeneous. To...
recipeIngredient: 2 leeks, white part only, thinly sliced and washed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees. Pour the oil into a large skillet set over medium heat. Add the onion and cook cook for 6 to 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Dump in the leeks, and cook for another 8 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until very soft. Sprinkle with a pinch of salt, turn off the heat, and set aside to cool.
Rub the butter on a 10-inch cake pan.
Add the sifted flour and baking powder to a large bowl.

Whisk together the eggs and yogurt in another large bowl. Add the feta and dill and fold in. Then whisk in the flour and baking powder. Finally, fold in the cooled onion and leek mixture. Season mixture with salt and pepper.
Pour into the baking pan, and set in the oven. Cook for 30 minutes. Turn the heat to 350 degrees and cook for another 10 minutes. Remove the pan and let cool for 10 minutes. Then dig in.
